com.gemengine.system.common

Class TimedSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gemengine.system.common.SystemBase
      • com.gemengine.system.common.TimedSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<SystemBase>

    public abstract class TimedSystem
extends SystemBase
    A system that has an onUpdate(float) event, which is called every interval ms.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TimedSystem()
      Create a new timed system with an update interval of 16 ms and priority max(will be called last in the update).
      TimedSystem(float interval, boolean enable, int priority)
      Create a new timed system with a given interval to call the onUpdate(float).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getInterval()
      The repeat interval in milliseconds.
      abstract void onUpdate(float delta)
      Called every interval ms.

      • Methods inherited from class com.gemengine.system.common.SystemBase

        compareTo, getPriority, isEnable, setEnable

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TimedSystem

        public TimedSystem()
        Create a new timed system with an update interval of 16 ms and priority max(will be called last in the update).

      • TimedSystem

        public TimedSystem(float interval,
                   boolean enable,
                   int priority)
        Create a new timed system with a given interval to call the onUpdate(float).
        Parameters:
        interval - The interval
        enable - True if this system should work, false otherwise.
        priority - Lower means the update is called before other systems that have this number higher

    • Method Detail

      • getInterval

        public float getInterval()
        The repeat interval in milliseconds. Default is 16, aka 60 fps.

      • onUpdate

        public abstract void onUpdate(float delta)
        Called every interval ms.
        Parameters:
        delta - time elapsed from last call.
